trans-unit.source: Provides information about the current system environment.
trans-unit.target: 提供当前系统环境的有关信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class provides `static` properties that can be used to get information about the current system environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类提供`static`可以用于获取有关当前的系统环境的信息的属性。

trans-unit.source: The class provides access to information such as Windows display element sizes, operating system settings, network availability, and the capabilities of hardware installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供信息的访问权限，如 Windows 显示元素大小、 操作系统设置、 网络可用性以及系统上安装的硬件的功能。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 此类无法实例化。

trans-unit.source: For more information about system-wide parameters, see "SystemParametersInfo" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com).
trans-unit.target: 系统级参数的详细信息，请参阅"SystemParametersInfo"中的平台 SDK 文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the active window tracking delay.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动窗口跟踪延迟。

trans-unit.source: The active window tracking delay, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 活动窗口跟踪延迟（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the direction in which the operating system arranges minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示操作系统排列最小化窗口的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection" /> values that indicates the direction in which the operating system arranges minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection" /> 值之一，指示操作系统排列最小化窗口的方向。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection> property indicates the direction in which minimized windows are arranged on the desktop or in a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection>属性指示在桌面上或多文档界面 (MDI) 容器中排列最小化的窗口的方向。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> 值，该值指示操作系统排列最小化窗口的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> values that indicates the starting position from which the operating system arranges minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> 值之一，指示操作系统排列最小化窗口的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition> property indicates the corner of a screen or window in which the operating system begins to arrange minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition>属性指示屏幕或在其中操作系统开始排列最小化的窗口的窗口的角。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BootMode" /> 值，该值指示系统启动的启动模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BootMode" /> values that indicates the boot mode the system was started in.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BootMode" /> 值之一，指示系统启动的启动模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BootMode%2A> property indicates whether the operating system was started in a normal or safe boot mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BootMode%2A>属性指示是否在正常或安全启动模式下启动操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness, in pixels, of a three-dimensional (3-D) style window or system control border.
trans-unit.target: 获取三维 (3-D) 样式窗口或系统控件边框的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the width, in pixels, of a 3-D style vertical border, and the height, in pixels, of a 3-D style horizontal border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示三维样式垂直边框的宽度（以像素为单位）和三维样式水平边框的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A> property indicates the thickness, in pixels, of a three-dimensional (3-D) style system control border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A>属性指示以像素为单位，三维 (3-D) 样式系统控件边框的粗细。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A> property indicates the width of a vertical 3-D border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A>属性指示垂直的三维边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A> property indicates the height of a horizontal 3-D border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A>属性指示水平的三维边框的高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A> property indicates the thickness of a window or system control border that is not a 3-D style border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A>属性指示不是一个三维样式边框窗口或系统控件边框的粗细。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border multiplier factor that is used when determining the thickness of a window's sizing border.
trans-unit.target: 获取边框倍数因子，该倍数因子在确定窗口的大小调整边框的粗细时使用。

trans-unit.source: The multiplier used to determine the thickness of a window's sizing border.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定窗口大小调整边框的粗细的倍数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness, in pixels, of a flat-style window or system control border.
trans-unit.target: 获取平面样式窗口边框或系统控件边框的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the width, in pixels, of a vertical border, and the height, in pixels, of a horizontal border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示垂直边框的宽度（以像素为单位）和水平边框的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A> property indicates the thickness of a flat-style system control border in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A>属性指示以像素为单位的平面样式系统控件边框的粗细。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A> property indicates the width of a vertical flat-style border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A>属性指示垂直的平面样式边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A> property indicates the height of a horizontal flat-style border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.BorderSize%2A>属性指示水平的平面样式边框的高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class indicates the thickness of a three-dimensional (3-D) style window or system control border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Border3DSize%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类指示三维 (3-D) 样式窗口或系统控件边框的粗细。

trans-unit.source: Gets the standard size, in pixels, of a button in a window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取窗口标题栏中按钮的标准尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the standard dimensions, in pixels, of a button in a window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示窗口标题栏中的按钮的标准尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.CaptionButtonSize%2A> property indicates the standard dimensions of a button in the title bar of a window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.CaptionButtonSize%2A>属性指示窗口标题栏中按钮的标准尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property can be used to ensure that a button is properly sized to fit within the title bar of a window.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值可以用于确保按钮正确大小以适合窗口的标题栏。

trans-unit.source: Window caption buttons should be sized less than or equal to the standard dimensions for window caption buttons to ensure that they can be displayed in view correctly.
trans-unit.target: 窗口标题按钮应调整为小于或等于窗口标题按钮，以确保它们可以显示在视图中正确的标准尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height, in pixels, of the standard title bar area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗口的标准标题栏区域的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the standard title bar area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的标准标题栏区域的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.CaptionHeight%2A> property indicates the height of the standard window title bar area, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.CaptionHeight%2A>属性指示的标准窗口标题栏区域，以像素为单位的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caret blink time.
trans-unit.target: 获取插入符号闪烁时间。

trans-unit.source: The caret blink time.
trans-unit.target: 插入符号闪烁时间。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width, in pixels, of the caret in edit controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取编辑控件中插入符号的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the caret in edit controls.
trans-unit.target: 编辑控件中的插入符号的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The caret indicates where text or graphics will be inserted into the edit control.
trans-unit.target: 插入符号指示在编辑控件插入文本或图形。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 该操作系统不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the NetBIOS computer name of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取本地计算机的 NetBIOS 计算机名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of this computer.
trans-unit.target: 当前计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ComputerName%2A> property retrieves the NetBIOS name of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ComputerName%2A>属性检索本地计算机的 NetBIOS 名称。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished with a call into the native System Information function GetComputerName.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用到本机的系统信息函数 GetComputerName 做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: This name is established at system startup, when the system reads it from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 当系统从注册表中读取它时，将在系统启动时，建立此名称。

trans-unit.source: If the local computer is a node in a cluster, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ComputerName%2A> returns the name of the cluster virtual server.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地计算机是在群集中，一个节点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ComputerName%2A>返回群集虚拟服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ComputerName%2A> method to determine the name of the computer that is displayed to other users on a network.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ComputerName%2A>方法来确定向网络上的其他用户显示计算机的名称。

trans-unit.target: 获取光标能够占用的最大大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the maximum dimensions of a cursor in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示光标的最大尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The system cannot create cursors of other sizes.
trans-unit.target: 系统无法创建其他大小的游标。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the operating system is capable of handling double-byte character set (DBCS) characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示操作系统能否处理双字节字符集 (DBCS) 的字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system supports DBCS; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统支持 DBCS，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DbcsEnabled%2A> property indicates whether the current operating system supports DBCS.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DbcsEnabled%2A>属性指示当前操作系统是否支持 DBCS。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已安装调试版本的 USER.EXE。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the debugging version of USER.EXE is installed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已安装调试版本的 USER.EXE，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dimensions, in pixels, of the area within which the user must click twice for the operating system to consider the two clicks a double-click.
trans-unit.target: 获取如下区域的尺寸（以像素为单位）：用户必须在此区域内单击两次，操作系统才将这两次单击视为一次双击。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the dimensions, in pixels, of the area within which the user must click twice for the operating system to consider the two clicks a double-click.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示如下区域的尺寸（以像素为单位）：用户必须在此区域内单击两次，操作系统才将这两次单击视为一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DoubleClickSize%2A> property indicates the size of a rectangular area centered around the point at which the last click occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DoubleClickSize%2A>属性指示发生最后一次的单击的点为中心的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: To cause a double-click, a second click must occur within the area of the rectangle before the double-click time elapses.
trans-unit.target: 若要使双击，第二次单击之前必须进行的矩形区域内双击时间已过。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DoubleClickTime%2A> property indicates the maximum number of milliseconds that can elapse before a second click for the second click to cause a double-click.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DoubleClickTime%2A>属性指示最大的第二次单击，以形成双击第二次单击前所经过的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of milliseconds that can elapse between a first click and a second click for the OS to consider the mouse action a double-click.
trans-unit.target: 获取要使操作系统将鼠标操作视为双击，第一次单击与第二次单击之间可以经过的最大毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, that can elapse between a first click and a second click for the OS to consider the mouse action a double-click.
trans-unit.target: 要使操作系统将鼠标操作视为双击，第一次单击与第二次单击之间可以经过的最大时间量（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is a series of two clicks of the mouse button, the second occurring within a specified length of time after, and within a specified distance from, the first.
trans-unit.target: 双击是两次单击鼠标按钮，第二个发生在指定时间长度的之后，以及指定的距离中从第一个的一系列。

trans-unit.source: The double-click time is the maximum number of milliseconds that can elapse between the first and second click of a double-click.
trans-unit.target: 双击时间是最大可间隔第一个和第二次单击一次双击的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DoubleClickSize%2A> property indicates the size of a rectangular area centered around the point at which the last click occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DoubleClickSize%2A>属性指示发生最后一次的单击的点为中心的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: To cause a double-click, a second click must occur within the area of the rectangle before the double-click time elapses.
trans-unit.target: 若要使双击，第二次单击之前必须进行的矩形区域内双击时间已过。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user has enabled full window drag.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户是否已启用全窗口拖动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user has enabled full window drag; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户已启用全窗口拖动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, the content of a window is refreshed during a window move or resize drag, using the current position and size as they are updated.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性是`true`、 窗口的内容刷新窗口移动期间或拖动调整大小，使用当前的位置和大小，因为它们会更新。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width and height of a rectangle centered on the point the mouse button was pressed, within which a drag operation will not begin.
trans-unit.target: 获取以鼠标按钮的按下点为中心的矩形的宽度和高度，在该矩形内不会开始拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the area of a rectangle, in pixels, centered on the point the mouse button was pressed, within which a drag operation will not begin.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定以鼠标按钮的按下点为中心的矩形区域（以像素为单位），在该矩形区域内不会开始拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DragSize%2A> property indicates the size, in pixels, of a rectangle centered around the point at which the mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DragSize%2A>属性指示的大小，以像素为单位的鼠标按钮曾按下的点为中心的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Windows uses the rectangle as a boundary within which it does not start a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Windows 使用未在其中启动拖动操作的边界的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A user can hold a mouse button down and move the mouse within this area before a drag operation begins, which enables the user to click and release the mouse button easily without unintentionally starting a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以按住鼠标按钮，在此区域内移动鼠标之前拖动操作开始时，它使用户能够单击并轻松地释放鼠标按钮，而不会无意中启动拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness, in pixels, of the frame border of a window that has a caption and is not resizable.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有标题但不可调整大小的窗口的边框粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the thickness, in pixels, of a fixed sized window border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定大小固定的窗口边框的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FixedFrameBorderSize%2A> property indicates the thickness of the frame, in pixels, around the perimeter of a window that has a caption but is not sizable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FixedFrameBorderSize%2A>属性指示的帧，以像素为单位，具有标题但不可调整大小的窗口周围的粗细。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FixedFrameBorderSize%2A> is the height of the horizontal border and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FixedFrameBorderSize%2A> is the width of the vertical border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FixedFrameBorderSize%2A>是横框线的高度和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FixedFrameBorderSize%2A>是竖框线的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font smoothing contrast value used in ClearType smoothing.
trans-unit.target: 获取 ClearType 平滑设置中使用的字体平滑显示对比度值。

trans-unit.source: The ClearType font smoothing contrast value.
trans-unit.target: ClearType 字体平滑对比度值。

trans-unit.source: The default ClearType font smoothing value is 1400, but it can be any value from 1000 to 2200.
trans-unit.target: 默认 ClearType 字体平滑值为 1400，但它可以是从 1000年到 2200年任何值。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the display device and the user's sensitivity to colors, a higher or lower contrast value may improve readability.
trans-unit.target: 根据显示设备和颜色的用户的敏感性，较高或较低的对比度值可能提高可读性。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.target: 该操作系统不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current type of font smoothing.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的字体平滑显示类型。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the current type of font smoothing.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示字体平滑的当前类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FontSmoothingType%2A> property returns a value that indicates the type of currently active font smoothing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FontSmoothingType%2A>属性返回一个值，该值指示当前处于活动状态的字体平滑显示的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates the meaning of the values returned by this property:
trans-unit.target: 下表指示此属性返回的值的含义：

trans-unit.source: Value
Meaning
trans-unit.target: 含义

trans-unit.source: Font smoothing type could not be determined.
trans-unit.target: 无法确定字体平滑显示类型。

trans-unit.source: Standard font smoothing.
trans-unit.target: 标准字体平滑显示。

trans-unit.source: ClearType font smoothing.
trans-unit.target: ClearType 字体平滑显示。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 该操作系统不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness, in pixels, of the resizing border that is drawn around the perimeter of a window that is being drag resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取在正拖动调整大小的窗口周围绘制的大小调整边框的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the thickness, in pixels, of the width of a vertical resizing border and the height of a horizontal resizing border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示垂直大小调整边框的宽度的粗细和水平大小调整边框的高度的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FrameBorderSize%2A> property indicates the width and height of the resizing border for a window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FrameBorderSize%2A>属性指示的宽度和窗口的大小调整边框的高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> value of this property is the width of a vertical resizing border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>此属性的值是垂直大小调整边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> value of this property is the height of a horizontal resizing border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>此属性的值是水平大小调整边框的高度。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value for the current display device.
trans-unit.target: 当前显示设备的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness, in pixels, of a flat-style window or system control border for a given DPI value.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定 DPI 值的平面样式窗口边框或系统控件边框的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the width, in pixels, of a vertical border, and the height, in pixels, of a horizontal border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示垂直边框的宽度（以像素为单位）和水平边框的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value for the current display device.
trans-unit.target: 当前显示设备的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default height, in pixels, of the horizontal scroll bar for a given DPI value.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定 DPI 值的水平滚动条的默认高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default height, in pixels, of the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 水平滚动条的默认高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value for the current display device.
trans-unit.target: 当前显示设备的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font used to display text on menus for use in changing the DPI for a given display device.
trans-unit.target: 获取字体，该字体用于显示更改给定显示设备的 DPI 的菜单上的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to display text on menus.
trans-unit.target: 用于在菜单上显示文本的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The DPI value for the current display device.
trans-unit.target: 当前显示设备的 DPI 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default height, in pixels, of the vertical scroll bar for a given DPI value.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定 DPI 值的垂直滚动条的默认高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default height, in pixels, of the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条的默认高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user has enabled the high-contrast mode accessibility feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户是否已启用高对比度模式辅助功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user has enabled high-contrast mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户已启用高对比度模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The high-contrast accessibility feature can make the screen easier for some users to view by enabling a color scheme that can heighten screen contrast with alternative color combinations.
trans-unit.target: 高对比度可访问性功能可使屏幕便于查看通过启用的配色方案，可以提高使用替代颜色组合的屏幕对比度某些用户。

trans-unit.source: Some of the schemes also change font sizes for easier reading.
trans-unit.target: 某些方案还会更改字体大小，以便于阅读。

trans-unit.source: The high-contrast mode feature can be enabled or disabled through the Accessibility Options control panel.
trans-unit.target: 高对比度模式功能可以启用或禁用通过控制面板的辅助功能选项。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.target: 获取系统聚焦框的左右边缘的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The thickness of the left and right edges of the system focus rectangle, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 系统焦点矩形的左边缘和右边缘的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.HorizontalFocusThickness%2A>属性指示系统聚焦框，以像素为单位的左右边缘的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The system focus rectangle is used to draw user's attention to a window or area by displaying a rectangular highlighted outline.
trans-unit.target: 系统焦点矩形用于显示矩形突出显示的轮廓绘制用户对某个窗口或区域的注意。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用活动窗口跟踪。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if active window tracking is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用活动窗口跟踪，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsActiveWindowTrackingEnabled%2A> property indicates whether active window tracking is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsActiveWindowTrackingEnabled%2A>属性指示是否启用活动窗口跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Active window tracking causes any window the mouse is directly over to become the active window.
trans-unit.target: 活动窗口跟踪会导致任何窗口鼠标将直接超过成为活动的窗口。

trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用组合框的滑动打开效果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the slide-open effect for combo boxes is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用组合框的滑动打开效果，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsComboBoxAnimationEnabled%2A> property indicates whether the slide-open effect for system control combo boxes is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsComboBoxAnimationEnabled%2A>属性指示是否启用系统控件组合框的滑动打开效果。

trans-unit.source: When the slide-open effect for system control combo boxes is enabled, the drop down menu of a combo box slides into view when it is displayed, instead of being immediately fully drawn in view.
trans-unit.target: 启用系统控件组合框的滑动打开效果时，组合框的下拉菜单将滑到视图中显示时，而不是立即完全视图中绘制。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已启用投影效果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the drop shadow effect is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: On other platforms, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在其他平台上，此属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示本机用户菜单是否具有平面菜单外观。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used and always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性未使用且始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether font smoothing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已启用字体平滑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the font smoothing feature is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用字体平滑功能，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This font smoothing feature uses font antialiasing to make font curves appear smoother by painting pixels at different gray levels.
trans-unit.target: 此字体平滑功能使用字体抗锯齿功能来使不同的灰色级别绘制像素看起来更平滑的字体曲线。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether hot tracking of user-interface elements, such as menu names on menu bars, is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用对用户界面元素（如菜单栏上的菜单名）的热跟踪。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if hot tracking of user-interface elements is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用用户界面元素的热跟踪，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsHotTrackingEnabled%2A> property indicates whether hot tracking of user-interface elements is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsHotTrackingEnabled%2A>属性指示是否已启用的用户界面元素的热跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Hot tracking means that when the cursor moves over an item, it is highlighted but not selected.
trans-unit.target: 热跟踪意味着，当光标移动在某个项之上时，则它会突出显示，但未选中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user relies on the keyboard instead of the mouse, and prefers applications to display keyboard interfaces that would otherwise be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户是否依赖键盘而不是依赖鼠标，以及是否更希望应用程序显示在其他情况下隐藏的键盘界面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard preferred mode is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用键盘首选模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsKeyboardPreferred%2A> property indicates whether the user has indicated a preference for keyboard-based input interfaces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsKeyboardPreferred%2A>属性指示用户是否具有指示基于键盘输入接口的首选项。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if smooth-scrolling is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用平滑滚动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsListBoxSmoothScrollingEnabled%2A> property indicates whether the smooth-scrolling effect for system control list boxes is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsListBoxSmoothScrollingEnabled%2A>属性指示是否启用系统控件列表框的平滑滚动效果。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether menu fade or slide animation features are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用菜单淡出或滑动动画功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if menu fade or slide animation is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用菜单淡入淡出或滑动动画，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuAnimationEnabled%2A> property indicates whether either of the fade or slide animation features of system control menus is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuAnimationEnabled%2A>属性指示是否启用其中一个的系统控件菜单淡入淡出或滑动动画功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuFadeEnabled%2A> property indicates whether menus use fade or slide animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuFadeEnabled%2A>属性指示菜单是否使用淡入淡出或滑动动画。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether menu fade animation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用菜单淡化动画。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if fade animation is enabled; <see langword="false" /> if it is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用淡入淡出动画，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果已禁用该功能，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuFadeEnabled%2A> property indicates whether a menu uses fade animation, if menu animation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuFadeEnabled%2A>属性指示菜单是否使用淡入淡出动画，如果已启用菜单动画。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuAnimationEnabled%2A> property indicates whether menu animation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuAnimationEnabled%2A>属性指示是否启用菜单动画。

trans-unit.source: If menu animation is enabled and the value of this property is `true`, menus use fade animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用菜单动画，而且此属性的值是`true`，菜单使用淡入淡出动画。

trans-unit.source: If menu animation is enabled and the value of this property is `false`, menus use slide animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用菜单动画，而且此属性的值是`false`，菜单使用滑动动画。

trans-unit.source: If menu animation is disabled, the value of this property is meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用菜单动画，则此属性的值是无意义。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuAnimationEnabled%2A> is `false`, the value of this property is meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuAnimationEnabled%2A>是`false`，此属性的值是无意义。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: On other platforms, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在其他平台上，此属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard repeat-delay setting.
trans-unit.target: 获取键盘重复延迟设置。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard repeat-delay setting, from 0 (approximately 250 millisecond delay) through 3 (approximately 1 second delay).
trans-unit.target: 键盘重复延迟设置，从 0（约 250 毫秒延迟）到 3（约 1 秒延迟）。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the amount of time that elapses after a key is pressed and held down until keystroke repeat messages are sent by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示的时间之后将密钥按下并按住键击重复通过操作系统发送的消息的时间量。

trans-unit.source: This value is in the range from 0 (approximately 250 millisecond delay) through 3 (approximately 1 second delay).
trans-unit.target: 此值是从 0 （约 250 毫秒延迟） 到 3 （约 1 秒延迟） 范围内。

trans-unit.source: The actual delay associated with each value may vary depending on the hardware.
trans-unit.target: 每个值与关联的实际延迟可能因硬件而异。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.KeyboardSpeed%2A> property indicates the repeat speed setting that determines the length of time between each keystroke repeat message sent by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.KeyboardSpeed%2A>属性指示用于确定由操作系统发送每个键击重复消息之间的时间长度的重复速度设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard repeat-speed setting.
trans-unit.target: 获取键盘重复速度设置。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard repeat-speed setting, from 0 (approximately 2.5 repetitions per second) through 31 (approximately 30 repetitions per second).
trans-unit.target: 键盘重复速度设置，从 0（约每秒重复 2.5 次）到 31（约每秒重复 30 次）。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the time between each keystroke repeat message that is sent when a user presses and holds a key down.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示当用户按下并按住某个键发送每个键击重复消息之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: This is a value in the range from 0 (approximately 2.5 repetitions per second) through 31 (approximately 30 repetitions per second).
trans-unit.target: 到 31 （每秒重复为大约 30 次），这是从 0 （每秒重复为大约 2.5 次） 范围中的值。

trans-unit.source: The actual repeat rates are hardware-dependent and may vary from a linear scale by as much as 20%.
trans-unit.target: 实际重复速率是与硬件相关的和可能因线性刻度从 20%。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.KeyboardDelay%2A> property indicates the length of time after a key is pressed and held down before keystroke repeat messages are sent by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.KeyboardDelay%2A>属性指示的总时间后将密钥按下并按住之前击键重复通过操作系统发送的消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the operating system is enabled for the Hebrew and Arabic languages.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示操作系统是否可使用希伯来语和阿拉伯语。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system is enabled for Hebrew or Arabic; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统支持希伯来语或阿拉伯语，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MidEastEnabled%2A> property indicates whether the operating system is enabled for the Hebrew and Arabic languages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MidEastEnabled%2A>属性指示是否为希伯来语和阿拉伯语语言启用操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dimensions, in pixels, of a normal minimized window.
trans-unit.target: 获取正常的最小化窗口的尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the dimensions, in pixels, of a normal minimized window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示正常的最小化窗口的尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimizedWindowSize%2A> property indicates the size of the area occupied by a normal minimized window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimizedWindowSize%2A>属性指示占用正常的最小化窗口的区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dimensions, in pixels, of the area each minimized window is allocated when arranged.
trans-unit.target: 获取排列最小化窗口时分配给每个最小化窗口的区域的尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the area each minimized window is allocated when arranged.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示排列最小化窗口时分配给每个最小化窗口的区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimizedWindowSpacingSize%2A> property indicates the size, in pixels, of an arrangement grid cell for a minimized window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimizedWindowSpacingSize%2A>属性指示的大小，以像素为单位的最小化窗口排列网格单元格。

trans-unit.source: Each minimized window fits into a rectangle this size when arranged.
trans-unit.target: 每个最小化的窗口将此大小排列适合的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is always greater than or equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimumWindowSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值始终是大于或等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimumWindowSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum width and height for a window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗口的最小宽度和高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the minimum allowable dimensions of a window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定窗口的最小允许尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimumWindowSize%2A> property indicates the dimensions specified by Windows as the minimum size for a window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinimumWindowSize%2A>属性指示由 Windows 指定为窗口的最小大小的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to limit the resizing of windows to dimensions not exceeding either dimension returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于限制对不超过此属性返回任一维度的维度的窗口的大小调整。

trans-unit.source: Developers of applications capable of resizing windows may want to use the value of this property to ensure that the application does not attempt to resize the window to a lesser width or height, since the dimensions of the window would be limited by the system.
trans-unit.target: 能够调整窗口大小时的应用程序的开发人员可能想要使用此属性的值以确保应用程序不会尝试调整为更小的宽度或高度，窗口的大小，因为系统将有限的窗口的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default minimum dimensions, in pixels, that a window may occupy during a drag resize.
trans-unit.target: 获取在拖动调整大小过程中窗口可能占用的默认最小尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the default minimum width and height of a window during resize, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示在调整大小过程中窗口的默认最小宽度和高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinWindowTrackSize%2A> property indicates the default smallest window size that can be produced by using the borders to size the window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MinWindowTrackSize%2A>属性指示的默认最小窗口大小可以由使用边框来调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot drag the window frame to a size smaller than these dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能将拖窗口框架为大小小于这些维度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can override these values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>可以通过设置重写这些值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimumSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of display monitors on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 获取桌面上显示监视器的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of monitors that make up the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 组成桌面的监视器的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MonitorCount%2A> property indicates the number of monitors currently recognized by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MonitorCount%2A>属性指示的当前识别由操作系统的监视器的数目。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a value greater than one only if multiple monitors are currently recognized by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个值大于 1，仅当多个监视器当前所识别的操作系统。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all the display monitors are using the same pixel color format.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否所有显示监视器都使用相同的像素颜色格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all monitors are using the same pixel color format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有监视器都使用相同的像素颜色格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MonitorsSameDisplayFormat%2A> indicates whether all monitors currently recognized by the operating system are using the same pixel color format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MonitorsSameDisplayFormat%2A>指示是否当前识别由操作系统的所有监视器都使用相同的像素颜色格式。

trans-unit.source: Pixel formats define the data structure used to encode pixel color and luminosity information.
trans-unit.target: 像素格式定义用于对像素颜色和亮度信息进行编码的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> enumeration indicates a set of standard pixel color formats.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>枚举指示一组标准的像素颜色格式。

trans-unit.source: Pixel values can be encoded in a variety of formats, with differing color value ranges and bit precisions, and differing positions of bits in a pixel data format structure.
trans-unit.target: 像素值可以以各种格式，使用不同颜色值的范围进行编码，并且位精度，并为位在像素数据的不同位置格式化结构。

trans-unit.source: Two displays can have the same bit depth but different color formats.
trans-unit.target: 两个显示可以具有相同的位深度，但具有不同颜色格式。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of buttons on the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标上的按钮数。

trans-unit.source: The number of buttons on the mouse, or zero if no mouse is installed.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标按钮数，或者在未安装鼠标时为零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseButtons%2A> property indicates the number of mouse buttons recognized on the currently installed mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseButtons%2A>属性指示识别当前已安装的鼠标上的鼠标按钮的数目。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseButtons%2A> property to toggle additional functionality for users with more or less than the standard number of mouse buttons supported by your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseButtons%2A>属性比标准的支持你的应用程序的鼠标按钮数多或少切换为与用户的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the functions of the left and right mouse buttons have been swapped.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已交换鼠标左右按钮的功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the functions of the left and right mouse buttons are swapped; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标左右按钮的功能已切换，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dimensions, in pixels, of the rectangle within which the mouse pointer has to stay for the mouse hover time before a mouse hover message is generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取特定矩形的尺寸（以像素为单位），鼠标指针必须在该矩形范围内停留达到鼠标悬停时间后，才会生成鼠标悬停消息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that indicates the dimensions, in pixels, of the rectangle within which the mouse pointer has to stay for the mouse hover time before a mouse hover message is generated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指示在鼠标悬停消息生成之前，鼠标指针必须在其中停留鼠标悬停时间的矩形的尺寸（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> property indicates the size of the rectangle within which the mouse pointer has to stay for the mouse hover time before a mouse hover message is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>属性指示在其中鼠标指针必须停留达到鼠标悬停时间后才会生成鼠标悬停消息在该矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property indicates the time, in milliseconds, that a mouse pointer must remain within an area the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> property in order to generate a mouse hover message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性指示的时间，以毫秒为单位，鼠标指针必须保持在某个区域的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>属性以生成鼠标悬停消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time, in milliseconds, that the mouse pointer has to stay in the hover rectangle before a mouse hover message is generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个以毫秒为单位的时间，鼠标指针必须在悬停矩形中停留该时间后，才会生成鼠标悬停消息。

trans-unit.source: The time, in milliseconds, that the mouse pointer has to stay in the hover rectangle before a mouse hover message is generated.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标悬停消息生成之前，鼠标指针必须停留在悬停矩形中的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property indicates the amount of time, in milliseconds, that a mouse pointer must remain within an area the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> property in order to generate a mouse hover message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性指示的时间，以毫秒为单位，鼠标指针必须保持在某个区域的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>属性以生成鼠标悬停消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> property indicates the size of the rectangle within which the mouse pointer has to stay for the mouse hover time before a mouse hover message is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>属性指示在其中鼠标指针必须停留达到鼠标悬停时间后才会生成鼠标悬停消息在该矩形的大小。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a pointing device is installed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已安装指点设备。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a mouse is installed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标已安装，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MousePresent%2A> property indicates whether a pointing device is present or installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MousePresent%2A>属性指示指针设备指示是存在还是安装在系统。

trans-unit.source: This is usually the case, so <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MousePresent%2A> almost always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 这通常是这种情况，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MousePresent%2A>几乎始终返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current mouse speed.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前鼠标的速度。

trans-unit.source: A mouse speed value between 1 (slowest) and 20 (fastest).
trans-unit.target: 鼠标速度值，范围为 1（最慢）到 20（最快）。

trans-unit.source: The mouse speed determines how far the pointer will move based on the distance the mouse moves.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标速度确定距离指针将基于在上移动鼠标移动的距离。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property ranges between 1 (slowest) and 20 (fastest).
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值范围为 1 （最慢） 到 20 （最快）。

trans-unit.source: A value of 10 is the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为值为 10。

trans-unit.source: The value can be set by an end user using the mouse control panel application or by an application using the `SystemParametersInfo` function of the Platform SDK.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置值，由最终用户使用鼠标控制面板应用程序或应用程序使用`SystemParametersInfo`的平台 sdk 的函数。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a mouse with a mouse wheel is installed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否安装了带有鼠标轮的鼠标。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a mouse with a mouse wheel is installed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已安装带鼠标轮的鼠标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelPresent%2A> property indicates whether the system recognizes a mouse wheel on the current mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelPresent%2A>属性指示系统是否识别当前鼠标的鼠标轮的鼠标。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows NT 4.0 or later, Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows NT 4.0 或更高版本、 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of the delta value of a single mouse wheel rotation increment.
trans-unit.target: 获取单次鼠标轮旋转增量的增量值。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the delta value of a single mouse wheel rotation increment.
trans-unit.target: 单次鼠标轮旋转增量的增量值。

trans-unit.source: The delta value is an integer value that represents a single mouse wheel rotation increment.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值，表示单次鼠标轮旋转增量的增量值。

trans-unit.source: A downward mouse wheel rotation produces a negative delta value.
trans-unit.target: 向下的鼠标轮旋转生成负的增量值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of lines to scroll when the mouse wheel is rotated.
trans-unit.target: 获取滚动鼠标轮时所滚动过的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of lines to scroll on a mouse wheel rotation, or -1 if the "One screen at a time" mouse option is selected.
trans-unit.target: 单次鼠标轮旋转所滚动的行数，或 -1（如果选中“一次滚动一个屏幕”鼠标选项）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A> property indicates how many lines to scroll, by default, in a multi-line control that has a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A>属性指示如何滚动的行数，默认情况下，在具有滚动条的多行控件。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETWHEELSCROLLLINES and SPI_SETWHEELSCROLLLINES.
trans-unit.target: 对应的 Platform SDK 系统级参数为 SPI_GETWHEELSCROLLLINES 和 SPI_SETWHEELSCROLLLINES。

trans-unit.source: For more information about system-wide parameters, see "SystemParametersInfo" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 系统级参数的详细信息，请参阅"SystemParametersInfo"中的平台 SDK 文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to handle the special case that occurs if the "One screen at a time" mouse option is selected.
trans-unit.target: 一定要处理的特殊用例，如果选择"已完成一次一个屏幕"鼠标选项则会发生。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A> property has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A>属性具有值为-1。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the operating system natively supports a mouse wheel.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示操作系统本身是否支持鼠标轮。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system natively supports a mouse wheel; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统本身支持鼠标轮，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Mouse wheel operations that occur through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> object work even if the operating system does not natively support the wheel.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标轮操作发生通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>对象工作，即使操作系统不以本机方式支持鼠标轮。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows NT 4.0 or later, Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows NT 4.0 或更高版本、 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a network connection is present.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否存在网络连接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a network connection is present; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在网络连接，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Network%2A> property indicates whether the system has a currently established network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Network%2A>属性指示系统是否具有当前已建立的网络连接。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true` on all Windows platforms supported by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`true`在.NET Framework 支持的所有 Windows 平台上。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation> namespace to retrieve more accurate network status.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation>命名空间来检索更准确的网络状态。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.PrimaryMonitorSize%2A>属性指示主显示适配器的当前视频模式的尺寸。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示下拉菜单是否与相应的菜单栏项右对齐。

trans-unit.target: 如果下拉菜单与相应的菜单栏项右对齐，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果菜单左对齐，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a Security Manager is present on this operating system.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前操作系统上是否存在安全管理器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a Security Manager is present; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在安全管理器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Secure%2A> property indicates whether a Security Manager is available from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.Secure%2A>属性指示安全管理器是否可从操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Windows NT and Windows 2000 provide a Security Manager to determine access to the operating system registry and to the file system.
trans-unit.target: Windows NT 和 Windows 2000 提供安全管理器来确定与操作系统注册表和文件系统的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Windows 98 does not provide a Security Manager.
trans-unit.target: Windows 98 不提供安全管理器。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user prefers that an application present information in visual form in situations when it would present the information in audible form.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户是否希望应用程序在以音频形式表示信息时以可视形式表示信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application should visually show information about audible output; <see langword="false" /> if the application does not need to provide extra visual cues for audio events.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序应以可视形式显示音频输出的有关信息，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果应用程序不必为音频事件提供额外可视提示，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ShowSounds%2A> property indicates whether a user preference has been set that indicates the user prefers visual information displays for audio events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ShowSounds%2A>属性指示是否已被用户首选项集，指示用户希望为音频事件的可视信息显示。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide accessibility mode features to an application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于提供对应用程序的模式功能的可访问性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether user interface (UI) effects are enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是已启用还是已禁用用户界面 (UI) 效果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if UI effects are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用用户界面效果，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: UI effects include animation, fading, hot tracking, and smooth scrolling of system controls, and drawing a shadow under the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 用户界面效果包括淡出动画，热跟踪，以及系统控件的滚动和下鼠标光标绘制阴影的平滑。

trans-unit.source: When UI effects are disabled, these features are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 禁用用户界面效果后，这些功能将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: When UI effects are enabled, only the effects configured as active for the current user are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用用户界面效果，则会启用仅配置为供当前用户的影响。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists properties that indicate whether particular UI effects are enabled, if the value of this property is `true`:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了属性用来指示是否启用特定的用户界面效果，如果此属性的值是`true`:

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 项

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the slide-open effect for combo boxes is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用组合框的滑动打开效果。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the gradient effect for window title bars is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用窗口标题栏的渐变效果。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether hot tracking of user-interface elements, such as menu names on menu bars, is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用的用户界面元素，如菜单栏上的菜单名热跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the smooth-scrolling effect for list boxes is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用列表框的平滑滚动效果。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether menu fade or slide animation features are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用是否菜单淡入淡出或滑动动画功能。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether menu access keys are always underlined.
trans-unit.target: 指示菜单访问键是否始终带下划线。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the selection fade effect is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用所选内容淡入淡出效果。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether ToolTip animation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用工具提示动画。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: On other platforms, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在其他平台上，此属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the domain the user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户所属的域的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user domain.
trans-unit.target: 用户域的名称。

trans-unit.source: If a local user account exists with the same name as the user name, this property gets the computer name.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在与用户名同名的本地用户帐户，则此属性获取计算机名。

trans-unit.source: If a local user account exists with the same name as the user name, this property gets the computer name.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在与用户名同名的本地用户帐户，则此属性获取计算机名。

trans-unit.source: This is not supported on Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支持此。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 该操作系统不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: for reading an environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current process is running in user-interactive mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前进程是否在用户交互模式中运行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current process is running in user-interactive mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前进程在用户交互模式中运行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.UserInteractive%2A> property is `false`, do not display any modal dialogs or message boxes, as there is no graphical user interface for the user to interact with.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.UserInteractive%2A>属性是`false`，不显示任何模式对话框或消息框中，因为没有要与之交互的用户没有图形用户界面。

trans-unit.source: This property is `false` only when called from a service process or from a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是`false`仅当调用的服务进程或从 Web 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows NT 3.51 or later, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows NT 3.51 或更高版本、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 获取与当前线程相关联的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The user name of the user associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 与当前线程相关联的用户的用户名。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows NT workstation, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows NT 工作站，Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.target: 若要获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness, in pixels, of the top and bottom edges of the system focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取系统聚焦框上下边缘的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The thickness, in pixels, of the top and bottom edges of the system focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 系统焦点矩形的上边缘和下边缘的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalFocusThickness%2A> property indicates the height, in pixels, of the top and bottom edges of the system focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalFocusThickness%2A>属性指示的高度，以像素为单位，系统聚焦框的顶部和底部边缘。

trans-unit.source: The system focus rectangle is used to draw user's attention to a window or area by displaying a rectangular highlighted outline.
trans-unit.target: 系统焦点矩形用于显示矩形突出显示的轮廓绘制用户对某个窗口或区域的注意。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 该操作系统不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness, in pixels, of the top and bottom edges of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window being resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取在正调整大小的窗口周围的大小调整边框的上边缘和下边缘的粗细（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the top and bottom edges of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window being resized, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 在正调整大小（以像素为单位）的窗口周围的大小调整边框的上边缘和下边缘的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalResizeBorderThickness%2A> property indicates the height of the horizontal sizing border around the perimeter of a window being resized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalResizeBorderThickness%2A>属性指示正调整大小窗口周围水平大小调整边框的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height, in pixels, of the arrow bitmap on the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 获取垂直滚动条上箭头位图的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the arrow bitmap on the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条上箭头位图的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalScrollBarArrowHeight%2A> property indicates the height of the arrow bitmap on the vertical scroll bar system control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalScrollBarArrowHeight%2A>属性指示垂直滚动系统控件条上箭头位图的高度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and displays the current value of the property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>显示中的属性的当前值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height, in pixels, of the scroll box in a vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 获取垂直滚动条中滚动框的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the scroll box in a vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条中滚动框的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalScrollBarThumbHeight%2A> property indicates the height of the scroll box used to indicate scroll bar position and to drag the scroll bar to a new position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalScrollBarThumbHeight%2A>属性指示用于指示滚动条的位置和拖动到新位置的滚动条的滚动框的高度。

trans-unit.source: The scroll box is also called the thumb box.
trans-unit.target: 滚动框也被称为 thumb 框。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default width, in pixels, of the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 获取垂直滚动条的默认宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default width, in pixels, of the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条的默认宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the virtual screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取虚拟屏幕的界限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounding rectangle of the entire virtual screen.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，指定整个虚拟屏幕的边框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VirtualScreen%2A> property indicates the bounds of the entire desktop on a multi-monitor system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VirtualScreen%2A>属性指示在多监视器系统中的边界的整个桌面。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the maximum visual space available on a system that has multiple monitors installed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定已安装的多个监视器的系统上可用的最大 visual 空间。

trans-unit.source: The position coordinates of the rectangle indicate the position offset, in pixels, of the upper left corner of the virtual screen area relative to the upper left corner of the onscreen area of the primary display.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置坐标指示的位置偏移量，以像素为单位的屏幕区域主显示器的左上角相对虚拟屏幕区域的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The size values of the rectangle indicate the size of the virtual screen area.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的大小指示虚拟屏幕区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A> position coordinate of the rectangle is negative when the virtual screen starts to the left of the left edge of the primary display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A>虚拟屏幕左边的主显示器的左边缘启动时，在该矩形的位置坐标为负。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> coordinate of the rectangle is negative when the virtual screen starts above the top edge of the primary display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A>虚拟屏幕启动主显示器的顶部边缘上方时，在该矩形的坐标为负。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of the working area of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取屏幕的工作区域的大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the size, in pixels, of the working area of the screen.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示屏幕的工作区域的大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.WorkingArea%2A> property indicates the bounds of the screen that can be used by applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.WorkingArea%2A>属性指示可由应用程序屏幕的界限。

trans-unit.source: The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.
trans-unit.target: 工作区是显示器的桌面区域，不包括任务栏、停靠窗口和停靠工具栏。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.WorkingArea%2A> always returns the work area of the primary monitor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.WorkingArea%2A> 始终返回主监视器的工作区。

trans-unit.source: If you need the work area of a monitor in a multiple display environment, you can call one of the overloads of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.GetWorkingArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要在多个显示环境中的监视器的工作区，你可以调用的重载之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.GetWorkingArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
